text: Red Sonja is a 1985 Dutch American Italian action fantasy movie directed by Richard Fleischer and was based on the character of the same name by Roy Thomas and Barry Windsor-Smith. It stars Brigitte Nielsen, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Ronald Lacey, Pat Roach, Terry Richards, Sandahl Bergman and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 action movies Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:Dutch action movies Category:American action movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Fleischer
title: Red Sonja (movie)
